name: ListGroupRules
description:
Retrieve all group rules in your organization.

This tool fetches a list of all group rules configured within your organization. Use it to review or manage group rules effectively.

parameters.name: page_result_limit
parameters.description: Specifies the number of rule results to display per page. Provide an integer value.

value_schema.description: Specifies the number of rule results in a page

parameters.name: pagination_cursor_for_next_page
parameters.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for retrieving the next page of group rules.

value_schema.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of rules

parameters.name: search_keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search for specific group rules.

value_schema.description: Specifies the keyword to search rules for

parameters.name: display_group_names
parameters.description: Set to `groupIdToGroupNameMap` to display group names in the response.

value_schema.description: If specified as `groupIdToGroupNameMap`, then displays group names

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specifies the number of rule results in a page

value_schema.description: Specifies the number of rule results in a page

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of rules

value_schema.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of rules

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Specifies the keyword to search rules for

value_schema.description: Specifies the keyword to search rules for

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: If specified as `groupIdToGroupNameMap`, then displays group names

value_schema.description: If specified as `groupIdToGroupNameMap`, then displays group names

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
